metadata.title: CVE-2018-19838 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In LibSass prior to 3.5.5, functions inside ast.cpp forIMPLEMENT_AST_OPERATORS expansion allow attackers to cause adenial-of-service resulting from stack consumption via a crafted sass file,as demonstrated by recursive calls involving clone(), cloneChildren(), andcopy().

criterions.comment: libsass package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
